level.heading: WITHHOLDING AND FORFEITURE OF THE PURSE (§ 19-2042)

level.text: The Commission shall withhold, or order to be withheld, in whole or part, a contestant’s purse, if:
The referee determines that a contestant has committed a foul intentionally;
The referee stops the contest because the referee determines that a contestant is attempting to lose the contest; or
The Commission determines that a contestant did not put forth the contestant’s best efforts in a contest.
The Commission, upon reaching a final decision after a hearing, may:
Order that the purse be released to the contestant; or
Order that the purse, in whole or part, be forfeited, to the promoter.
